Text: Sometimes it seems that the only people who get comments are the big groups or when someone wants to complain. Thanks for the upload.

I've only just heard about this tv series and I'm a bit late downloading all the aired episodes, so far. I've noticed the 720p HD rips aren't as popular. So, i appreciate you (and the original uploader) bringing them to pb and the www. Once you own a 1080p plasma screen your eyes get used to the sharpness and depth of HD. Watching anything less is blurry. Like watching a VHS!
Totally agree about watching in HD. Once you get used to HD the other is hard to watch. Soon it will mostly be in HD as more people get LCD, LED and Plasma sets.
